body_html:
considering some of our tutorials also involve modifying code

Wait, modifying the TensorFlow code and recompiling it?

let's add jupyter in our devel images

Jupyter is already in the devel image I believe, the difference being that it doesn't start automatically, like the non-devel image does today.
body_text:
considering some of our tutorials also involve modifying code

Wait, modifying the TensorFlow code and recompiling it?

let's add jupyter in our devel images

Jupyter is already in the devel image I believe, the difference being that it doesn't start automatically, like the non-devel image does today.
body:
> considering some of our tutorials also involve modifying code

Wait, modifying the TensorFlow code and recompiling it?

> let's add jupyter in our devel images

Jupyter is already in the devel image I believe, the difference being that it doesn't start automatically, like the non-`devel` image does today.
